text: Alhamdhulillah...my daughter catching up very fast....Tuffaha Readers Enrichment Centre is a fantastic place for children to develop strong Arabic and English literacy skills. The structured curriculum and dedicated teachers ensure that students receive high-quality education tailored to their learning levels.

“This Islamic school has been a pillar of the community for over a decade, providing quality education rooted in strong values. The dedicated teachers and nurturing environment make it an excellent place for children to grow academically and spiritually. Highly recommended!”

I am a new parent who just enrolled my children at Tuffaha Readers in November 2024. I am impressed with their premises and the Arabic tuition methods for my children. Alhamdulillah, May Allah bless Tuffaha Readers and their efforts to support the Madrasah students in their journey of improving their Arabic knowledge. Ameen.

My younger sister who is in her 20s attended Tuffaha for her enrichment during her preschool years.  I enrolled my 1st son to prep him for MET few yrs back and now has decided to change my 2nd son's MET class to Tuffaha.  I love how Tuffaha has guided my sons in their Phonics and also Tilawati.  Loves the vibes and certainly the teachers there are very welcoming! May Allah bless all the teachers effort in educating the children! Amin!

Alhamdulillah! Tuffaha is the BEST place to send your kids.if you're struggling to teach them how to read Quran ,Arabic English and Malay. Affordable price, one to one and most importantly principal Anisah and all the teachers there motivate your kids to love and enjoy the learning journey! ❤️❤️❤️
